timeline.message:
Suppress false-alarm inspection.

I think a mid-air collision between #9260 and #9293 has led to
master being unable to pass insepctions in TeamCity. Hopefully
this fixes it.

timeline.bodyText: Would be nice to describe the explanation in your PR in here so someone in the future can remove the suppression if the inner class it depends on becomes static
timeline.author: suneet-s

replies.bodyText: I'll merge this and add the comment in a follow-up, just in the interests of time since the builds are broken. Good idea though.
replies.author: gianm

replies.bodyText: ^ Sorry I should have mentioned that was optional. Thanks for fixing the build!
replies.author: suneet-s
